A public statement and UN involvement signal international support and adherence to international law, putting pressure on China to de-escalate without immediate military confrontation.

Additionally, enhance electronic warfare measures to counteract missile locking and improve situational awareness.

The diplomatic protest and communication line seek to reduce the risk of miscalculation, while the reinforcement and defensive measures ensure the safety of U.S.A personnel and assets without escalating the conflict further.
